snippet.title: Carnage in Space: Crucible - Nightmare story trailer
snippet.description:
Coming soon to a PC near you!

Carnage in Space: Crucible is an intense indie action-platformer, and the sequel to Carnage in Space: Ignition.

In this Early Access version, players will have access to 1 of an eventual 3 stories to play through, starring returning hero Nightmare on his quest to lay down justice and protect the weak while on the run from the law himself.

The game will release on Steam for Windows on June 9.

Buy Crucible on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1938110/Carnage_in_Space_Crucible/

#platformer #actionplatformer #indiegame
